SEARCH
Package hac.services.impl

Class ItemServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
hac.services.impl.ItemServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemService
@Service public class ItemServiceImpl extends Object implements ItemService
ItemServiceImpl is an implementation of the ItemService interface that provides methods to perform various operations related to items and is the service in charge of the ItemRepository
